0.name: Sundown Estates
desc: "  You are walking down the main street of Midgard's famous Sundown
Estates.  Several modular houses are scattered throughout this district
which provides affordable housing for the citizens of Midgard.  The
road here is constructed of simple dwarven brick, and leads a twisted
path further to the west, into the heart of the estate.  To the far east
the land has been cleared for the eventual expansion of Sundown
Estates.

exits.info: door, closed, locked, pickproof, autoclose, autolock
door, closed, locked, pickproof, autoclose, autolock

8.name: The Iron Bark Lodge
desc: "  As you step into the cabin you are greeted by a beautiful crackling
fireplace and the smell of smouldering cedar.  The gorgeous solid brick
fireplace is adorned with small lanterns and wooden picture frames, all
containing photos of couples of adventurers.  A small wooden table and
chairs to one side of the room invite you to rest, as the smell of
good food wafts from the small kitchen area.  A coffee pot sits brewing
on the old style wood oven and hanging herbs frame the windowsill.  A
small black cat is curled up on the window ledge staring out at the birds
in the yard overlooking the lush green forest nearby.
8.flags: no_mob, indoors, peaceful, nosteal, no_sum, private, rent_room

exits.info: door, closed, locked, pickproof, autoclose, autolock

9.name: Dareth's House
desc: "  THe room is illuminated by the dim glow of torches bracketed on the
walls.  Shadows play tricks on your eyes, as they flicker and dance upon
granite.  The stone walls are adorned sparsely, with pieces of armor
and weaponry, retrieved as spoils from successful adventuring.  A large
round wooden table seems to glimmer in the torch light, glowing with
several coats of varnish.  Chairs are placed intermittantly around the
walls of the entire area.  As you take in your surroundings, you begin
to notice several people participating in a variety of activities.  Some
are part of the mercenary company returning from their adventures,
while others are hired workers who are cleaning the area.  One of the
workers sees you enter the room and brings you a goblet, a large
portion of fresh bread, cheese, and a warm smile.  Despite the sparse
furnishings and cold walls, this room is quite inviting.
9.flags: no_mob, indoors, peaceful, nosteal, no_sum, private, rent_room

10.name: The Wood Shed
desc: "  You are standing in a small annex attached to the cabin.  The smell of
cedar fills the air with the cut logs piled along the walls.  A small desk
sits beside the window here covered with miscellaenous bits and pieces.
